title: RockHog TV — Add new channel categories (Radio, DJs, IRL, Podcasts, PPV Events) to browsing + creator UI

requirements.summary: Support the new category values throughout the frontend channel create/edit + browse flows so they are sent to and read from the backend correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend accepts these new category values when creating/updating channels (in addition to existing categories).
Fetching channels returns the correct category value for channels in the new categories.
Existing categories (music/gaming/sports/horror/adult) continue to work without regression.

file_operations.description: Create shared category utilities: canonical category value list (including radio, djs, irl, audio_video_podcasts, ppv_events), value->label formatter, and any helpers needed to keep create/edit and browse UIs consistent.
Update category options to use the shared category list so creator create/edit can select and save the new category values via existing backend calls.
Use shared category utilities for display naming and any category comparisons so channels fetched from the backend filter correctly for the new categories.

requirements.summary: Add clickable Browse Categories tiles on the home page for Radio, DJs, IRL, Audio & Video Podcasts, and PPV Events that navigate to the existing category listing route.
acceptanceCriteria: The home page “Browse Categories” section shows the 5 new categories with clear English labels.
Clicking each new category navigates to its category listing page (the existing /category/$categoryName route).

file_operations.description: Extend the Browse Categories data to include Radio, DJs, IRL, Audio & Video Podcasts, and PPV Events and keep navigation using the existing /category/$categoryName route.
Add/confirm shared browse-category metadata (values + English labels) so the home page can render the 5 new categories consistently with the rest of the app.

requirements.summary: Add the new categories to the Creator channel editor category dropdown with clear English labels.
acceptanceCriteria: A creator can select each new category in the channel editor.
Saving a channel with any new category succeeds and the saved channel displays that category on browse/detail pages.

file_operations.description: Add Radio, DJs, IRL, Audio & Video Podcasts, and PPV Events to the category dropdown and render labels using the shared category label formatter (not naive capitalization).
Ensure the label formatter returns the required English labels (e.g., "IRL", "DJs", "PPV Events", "Audio & Video Podcasts").

requirements.summary: Standardize category display naming across category pages and category badges so new categories render with correct English capitalization.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to each new category page shows a correctly formatted page title.
Stream detail pages display a correctly formatted category badge for channels in the new categories.

file_operations.description: Implement/extend a single source of truth mapping for category value -> display label (handles IRL/DJs/PPV Events/Audio & Video Podcasts capitalization and spacing).
Replace the current title casing logic with the shared category label formatter for the category page title and related UI text.
Render the category badge using the shared category label formatter so grid cards display correctly formatted labels for the new categories.
Render the stream detail category badge using the shared category label formatter so new categories display with correct capitalization.

requirements.summary: Add static category icon assets for the new categories and map them in CategoryIcon so they render anywhere CategoryIcon is used.
acceptanceCriteria: Each new category shows a non-placeholder icon wherever CategoryIcon is used.
Icons are loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated and do not require backend changes to serve images.

file_operations.description: Add generated static icon asset for the Radio category at frontend/public/assets/generated/rockhog-cat-radio.dim_256x256.png.
Add generated static icon asset for the DJs category at frontend/public/assets/generated/rockhog-cat-djs.dim_256x256.png.
Add generated static icon asset for the IRL category at frontend/public/assets/generated/rockhog-cat-irl.dim_256x256.png.
Add generated static icon asset for the Audio & Video Podcasts category at frontend/public/assets/generated/rockhog-cat-podcasts.dim_256x256.png.
Add generated static icon asset for the PPV Events category at frontend/public/assets/generated/rockhog-cat-ppv.dim_256x256.png.

Extend the existing CategoryIcon mapping to include icons for radio, djs, irl, audio_video_podcasts (use rockhog-cat-podcasts.dim_256x256.png), and ppv_events (use rockhog-cat-ppv.dim_256x256.png), all served from frontend/public/assets/generated.
